power.title: Blood Sacrifice
power.fluff: You wound yourself, offering your pain to the spirits in exchange for a more telling strike

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can choose to take 1d10 or 2d6 damage. You cannot reduce or negate this damage.
If you choose to take this damage, you gain a bonus to the damage roll for this power equal to the damage you took + your Constitution modifier. If the damage bloodied you, the bonus increases by +5.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you took the damage, you deal damage equal to one-half the minimum roll.

power.title: Crushing Rush
power.fluff: The impact of your attack smashes your foe back to crush it against solid terrain

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
If the target ends this push adjacent to blocking terrain, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack on a charge.

power.title: Curtain of Steel
power.fluff: You are the pacing lion, the circling predator, and no attack will come toward you without being answered in kind

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy adjacent to you makes an attack against you

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy adjacent to you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If the triggering attack hits you, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: If the triggering attack misses you, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Deny Escape
power.fluff: In your bloodlust, letting an enemy go isn't an option, so you attack with a force that prevents it from escaping your fury

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Whirling Frenzy:
section.text: You can choose to deal 2[W] (main) + 2[W] (off-hand) + your Strength modifier damage instead.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Devastating Leverage
power.fluff: You swing your weapon in a wide arc, using the terrible power generated by its length to smash your enemy to the ground

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is not adjacent to you, you knock it prone.

power.title: Fearsome Smash
power.fluff: Smashing your weapon through your foe's defenses injures both body and will

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum -3 penalty).

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can also use this power as an immediate interrupt with the following trigger and hit:

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy adjacent to you hits you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum -3 penalty).

power.title: Feast of Violence
power.fluff: You drop your guard as you come close for your attack, drawing primal strength from the violence directed at you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can choose to provoke opportunity attacks.
If you do, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each creature that attacks you, and deal +1[W] additional damage with this attack.
If a creature scores a critical hit against you or a solo creature hits you, the additional damage increases to +2[W] instead.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you chose to provoke opportunity attacks, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus + 1 for each opportunity attack that hit you.
